title: But seriously, can we get a %HP OnHit magic damage item?
body: Since Bork is becoming more attack damage-y and less attack speed-y this seems like an ideal time to create OnHit item that heals off any OnHit damage.

replies.body:
well, that is an interesting proposal. 

But, if i think it through, it sounds like a bad  idea.

Having mixed damage is a strenght that is supposed to be part of a champions core kit, (insert kogmaw and corki), a % hp onhit magic damage item will just make it  a nightmare for tanks to itemize against.
